attributes.action: Give Formula 1 Commentary Legend Murray Walker A Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Murray Walker commentated on motor racing for over 50 years. His enthusiasm for motor racing is unrivalled and he is almost as famous for his many gaffes, such as "I'm going to stop the startwatch" and "The car in front is absolutely unique – except for the one behind it, which is identical."
Yes, he has been given an OBE but this highly patriotic man should be given the highest award for giving so many people so much pleasure for over half a century.

rejection.details:
Please supply full name and address information.

The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
